review: Works great and can't wait to get another.

review: Why didnt I get this thing earlier?  Love it!
author: Elena

review: Awesome deal. Super easy to install. The picture and sound and everything works great. No buffering or lagging. Id definitely recommend this product.
author: James Cook

review: Loved it, has more programs then my smart TV, worth every penny, wish I would have gotten this a long time ago.
author: Grey Sides

review: Love it! Thank you Amazon for making my life easier.
author: Tina Long

review: Everything I expected and more. Perfect for a TV that is not a smart TV, but also one you're not ready to replace.
author: Michael Pryer

review: Makes it sooo easy to access Prime shows, Netflix, etc! Am hooked
author: Charlotte Joyner

review: Kinda cool, faster than my blue ray.

review: I really hate that I still have to plug it into an electrical outlet. I hate the wire having to hang from my t.v.
